title: The half-burned truth
text: Historically the strength and the quality of an alcoholic drink would be tested by burning out two portions of the liquid until just one portion is left.

title:
What is
 Firerock wines?
text: Firerock wines is a legendary Russian Breadwine that predates modern vodka by centuries.
